Name: Comment
User Name: This is a control block, where we can hand specific information to the software outside the drivers' blocks, and write comments

Name: Comment
User Name: Each line starting with "Comment" in the Name column can be used for free-form comments

Name: Comment
User Name: Below is the version number for the specific version of this control block: it is important that it not be changed
Version

Name: Comment
User Name: As you can see, we can leave lines mostly  blank, but, for each line in the control block, they MUST start with FALSE/ FALSE

Name: Comment
User Name: In order to pass information to the software, we must define the type of information we want to share in the UserName column, and the actual value in the City column

Name: Comment
User Name: In order to tell the software who is the ops manager and what is her phone number, we write:

Name: Comment
User Name: OpsManager (UserName | Phone)

Name: Comment
User Name: Please note that the separator between the name and the number is a specific separator: |

Name: Comment
User Name: In order to tell the software who is (are) the backup driver(s), we write this line, which can be repeated for several backup drivers:

Name: Comment
User Name: BackupDriverUserName

Name: Comment
User Name: In order to tell the software who is the cleanup driver for each split restaurant, we write (this line can be repeated for several split restaurants):

Name: Comment
User Name: SplitRestaurant (Name | CleanupDriverUserName)

Name: Comment
User Name: We need a SplitRestaurant line for each split restaurant in the run. If none are split, the SplitRestaurant line must be deleted or commented

Name: Comment
User Name: When you are ready to request routes, (a) take out the control block, and (b) submit to "Request driver routes DRAFT" thread in Hushworkflow

Name: Comment
User Name: When you are ready to request driver messages, (a) make sure the control block is there and filled, and (b) submit to "Request driver messages" in Hushworkflow
OpsManager (UserName | Phone)
SplitRestaurant (Name | CleanupDriverUserName)
BackupDriverUserName

User Name: vlookup formula (take off leading ')
